title: How To Contact Netflix Customer Service

steps.title: Visit https://help.netflix.com/en/contactus.
steps.content: Visit https://help.netflix.com/en/contactus . The page includes a few different options for contacting Netflix.

steps.title: Click the Call Us button.
steps.content: Click the Call Us button. This will pull up the phone number for Netflix as well as a service code (if you are signed in to your Netflix account ). Use this service code to speed up your service once you are on the line with an agent.

steps.title: Dial 1-844-505-2993.
steps.content: Dial 1-844-505-2993 . You will be prompted to enter your service code. You will then be offered a wait time before you are connected with an agent. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Open the Netflix app.
steps.content: Open the Netflix app. It's a black app with a red N . Log in if you're not signed in automatically. Note that you will only be able to call over an internet connection, as you will be using an in-app caller. Netflix will not open your Phone app.

steps.title: Tap your profile icon in the upper-right corner.
steps.content: Tap your profile icon in the upper-right corner.

steps.title: Tap Help at the bottom of the menu.
steps.content: Tap Help at the bottom of the menu. It is represented by an encircled question mark.

steps.title: Tap CALL.
steps.content: Tap CALL . You'll be connected to a Netflix Help Center representative. Alternatively, you may tap the CHAT button to open a live chat with a support agent.

steps.title: Go to https://help.netflix.com/en/contactus in a Web browser.
steps.content: Go to https://help.netflix.com/en/contactus in a Web browser. If you're a member and you're not logged in automatically, click Sign In , then enter your email address and password.

steps.title: Click Start Live Chat.
steps.content: Click Start Live Chat . This will open a pop-up chat window.

steps.title: Scroll down and click "Tell us what your issue is".
steps.content: Scroll down and click "Tell us what your issue is". A dialog box with a list of common issues will be displayed, but to start a chat with a live agent, you will need to click the Tell us what your issue is at the bottom of the chat window. This will give you a chance to start chatting with the Netflix bot.

steps.title: Type a reason for contacting Netflix.
steps.content: Type a reason for contacting Netflix. Try to be as detailed as possible.

steps.title: Click Chat with an agent.
steps.content: Click Chat with an agent . You'll then be connected with a Netflix Help Center representative.
